name: FreeFall (the good one)
description:
I have uploaded a demo of my game. It is nowhere near finished, this is just a preview of the first area so that I can get feedback on the movement/general design of it. WebGL messed up some of the UI and pixel snapping, so some things might look off - sorry!

Controls:

J - jump

K - flip

L - use item

P - switch item

esc - pause
